page.title: 08CARNON VALLEY RESTORATION
page.content: The valley has been an eyesore for many years due to the activities of tin streamers in the past. A few years ago, in 1980, Carnon Con- solidated Limited became the owners of the valley and decided to test the deposits to see if any of the remain- ing tin could be profitably recovered. As there was only one small section near the Devoran end of the valley worth recovering, the company decided it was about time to restore the rest of the valley up to Bissoe to make it green and pleasant again. Work has started with the holes and ponds being bulldozed and the rough land smoothed over. Much of it will be sown with grass seed and lots of trees and bushes planted. There will be asphalt paths for use by the elderly and disabled. Work should be completed by 1989.
